title: Very suspensful. Couldn't wait to see what was next.
review: If you easily get motion sickness this movie will have you hurting physically at the end.  The camera moves around alot.  My friends and I were pretty sick afterwards.  However it was still a great movie.  Kept me in suspense.  The actors were great.  They really made you feel for them.  I would have acted in the same way.  Anybody would have.
